package.name: cerberus_kolibri_sensor_config_1
package.description: The cerberus_kolibri_sensor_config_1 package, a customized Voliro OMAV outfitted with an OS0 lidar, 6 cameras and imu. The package is loosely derived from the cerberus_m100_sensor_config_1 and cerberus_anymal packages.
package.author: Olov Andersson
